text: Ricardo Fernandes Durão (13 June 1928 - 22 January 2021) was a Portuguese modern pentathlete. He competed at the 1952 Summer Olympics. Durão died on 22 January 2021, aged 92.Morreu Ricardo Durão, olímpico em pentatlo moderno em Helsínquia'1952 ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympians for Portugal Category:Modern pentathletes Category:Portuguese athletes
title: Ricardo Durão
